name: Olobollo (itch)
description:
CAN ONLY BE PLAYED WITH CONTROLLERS :)

WISHLIST on Steam (a better, and much larger version of the game is being developed): https://store.steampowered.com/app/1592650/Olobollo/

----------------

Olobollo is an action packed deathmatch experience, a mix of one man team football and magic!

2 players battle each other in unique, squishy arenas, trying to shoot their opponents and score goals, with the aim to be the last Olobollo standing!

Mix defense and attack, balancing agile dodging, ferocious blasts and protective flair!

Pickup unique powers, ranging from healing boosts and bat eggs, to deadly homing bolts and zooming morningstars!

----------------

Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Z1XWw1kmnvOOFsj6Bzy2g/videos
